CustomField.description: The amount in percent of increase over the capacity of a given Appointment slot that can be used for accommodating loyalty members scheduling at priority. Capacity overage calculation is the responsibility of the Scheduler business logic.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The amount in percent of increase over the capacity of a given Appointment slot that can be used for accommodating loyalty members scheduling at priority. Capacity overage calculation is the responsibility of the Scheduler business logic.
CustomField.label: Appointment Capacity Factor
